entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
